settings.title: ArhiMED - a Ukrainian company founded on the values of care and love.
settings.text: When founding ArhiMED, my vision was to contribute to a better world. I aimed to create something that would aid everyone in their daily lives, day by day, making life easier,healthier, more liberating, and comfortable. I wholeheartedly believe that by enhancing people's lives, we enhance the world. ArhiMED's products are crafted for the health, beauty, longevity, and well-being of every individual. Our commitment to these ideals forms the core of our company.We innovate for you, enhancing your quality of life.

settings.title: Each device is born with care in Ukraine. Designed by experts, with your well-being in mind
settings.text: Reliable. Functional. User-friendly and straightforward. Stylish and elegant ‚Äì that‚Äôs the essence of every ArhiMED device. At our company, we wholeheartedly believe that anything created with love and consideration contributes to a better world. This very principle is at the core of every ArhiMED product

settings.title: Impeccable Quality in Every ArhiMED Product
settings.text: We prioritize ensuring that you receive a flawless product. The ArhiMED company's Quality Control Department meticulously oversees every stage of production. Each ArhiMED device undergoes additional checks before being dispatched to you. We guarantee 100% quality in every device

settings.title: Experience 100% Satisfaction with ArhiMED
settings.text: In the creation of each ArhiMED product, we've taken care of every detail. We are confident that your new ArhiMED device will meet all your needs precisely

settings.title: Up to 3-Year Warranty on All Products
settings.text: We are confident that the ArhiMED device, created with love, will serve you for many years to come! Our extended warranty on all ArhiMED products is our testament to their impeccable quality

settings.title: International and European Certifications
settings.text: We take pride in the fact that every ArhiMED product is certified

settings.text: ArhiMED products are incredibly user-friendly. Nevertheless, we're always here for you! Feel free to ask us any questions about ArhiMED products. We're available 24/7 to assist you

ArhiMED - a young company founded in 2012 in Kyiv, swiftly conquered the Ukrainian market in just a few years.

In 2019, Arhimed earned the title of "brand ‚Ññ1" among producers of medical and beauty devices in Ukraine. By 2023, over 350,000 families worldwide are benefiting from Arhimed devices
